about_the_game:
This DLC includes a set of high resolution .png images of the Dakimakuras for the main characters of the game.

Included:
  • Luna Dakimakura
  • Celia Dakimakura
  • Melissa Dakimakura
  • Alexa Dakimakura
  • Yuuki Dakimakura

content_descriptors.notes: Includes images containing characters in lingerie and suggestive positions.

detailed_description:
This DLC includes a set of high resolution .png images of the Dakimakuras for the main characters of the game.

Included:
  • Luna Dakimakura
  • Celia Dakimakura
  • Melissa Dakimakura
  • Alexa Dakimakura
  • Yuuki Dakimakura

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 25 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 25 MB available space

short_description: A collection of five dakimakuras based on the characters of My Girlfriend.
